title: Sajan Re Jhoot Mat Bolo
overview: Sajan Re Jhoot Mat Bolo abbreviated as SRJMB was a Hindi sitcom telecast on SAB TV from Monday to Friday at 9.00 pm IST initially but later at 11:30 pm. The serial name was based on a famous song “Sajan re jhoot mat bolo, Khuda ke paas jana hai” from the movie Teesri Kasam.
